name: Clash of Dino hunter 3d Simulator game
name_original: Clash of Dino hunter 3d Simulator game
description:
Clash of Dino Simulator

Take control of a huge Tyrannosaurus (T-Rex) and rampage the city. Smash into cars. Knock over streetlights, mailboxes.
A really amazing dinosaur simulator game: get around with your dinosaur, eat everything you find on your way!
Feel the Real 3D Environment and HD graphics as Dino hunting humans and destroying the city throughout the game play. A new
challenging game of Dino Hunting, smash down the cities in this advanced dinosaur simulator.
While playing this amazing Dino Hunting simulator game, you will be put through various deadly challenges and objectives. Complete
the tasks and destroy the city in this action packed Dinosaur simulator game.

Key features:

- 3D and Realistic Environments
- Realistic game play and cool sound
- Free app for everyone
- Realistic HD Graphics
